DOC.brief_summary: Aim : To determine effect pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) woman single delivery route . Pregnancy delivery route alter pelvic floor muscle strength consider risk factor urinary incontinence genital dystopia . Methods : A Randomized control clinical trial two hundred ninety-seven woman age 35 45 year old select functional assessment pelvic floor vaginal digital palpation perineometry . One hundred sixty-five ( 69.7 % ) exhibit muscle strength deficit include clinical trial . The participant distribute two group base delivery route ( A , vaginal delivery B , cesarean delivery ) randomly subdivide Groups A1 ( n = 44 ) B1 ( n = 42 ) , perform PFMT , Groups A2 ( n = 39 ) B2 ( n = 40 ) , undergo muscle training . The PFMT involve perineal contraction exercise dorsal decubitus , sit , stand position apply twice per week total 15 session . The functional assessment pelvic floor vaginal digital palpation perineometry perform 15 session pelvicÂ´s floor muscle train . The statistical analysis perform use Mann-Whitney Z test 5 % level significance .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Effect Pelvic Floor Muscle Training
DOC.criteria: age 35 45 year old , obstetric antecedent single delivery route ( i.e. , vaginal abdominal ) , regular menstrual cycle six month prior initial interview . woman complaint clinical manifestation suggestive urinary incontinence , intense pelvic vaginal pain , past history physical therapy pelvic floor strengthening , correction genital prolapse , myomectomy , ( total subtotal ) hysterectomy , morbidity diabetes arterial hypertension , body mass index ( BMIs ) determine physical examination equal high 30 kg/m2 .
